name: Policy Listing
sqlQuery:
SELECT id, policy_number, type, partner_name, client_name as client, status, CONCAT(effective_date, ' - ', expiration_date) as period, format(premium, 2) premium, COUNT(1) OVER() AS total_records
FROM policy_listing_v
WHERE 1=1 
  AND (:p_status IS NULL OR STATUS = :p_status)
  AND (:p_partner_id IS NULL OR partner_id = :p_partner_id) 
  AND (:p_search IS NULL 
  			OR INSTR(LOWER(policy_number), LOWER(:p_search)) > 0 
			OR INSTR(LOWER(client_name), LOWER(:p_search)) > 0
			OR INSTR(LOWER(type), LOWER(:p_search)) > 0
			OR INSTR(LOWER(premium), LOWER(:p_search)) > 0
  		)
ORDER BY policy_number
LIMIT :p_rows_per_page OFFSET :p_page_no

name: Policy Details
sqlQuery:
SELECT policy_number, status, 
		 type,
		 client_name, client_type,
		 effective_date, expiration_date,
		 coverage, premium,
		 payment_terms, preferred_communication,
		 mobile_phone, landline_phone,
		 billing_address, email,
		 date_created, updated_at
FROM policy_listing_v a
WHERE id = :id

name: Policy Partners
sqlQuery:
Select id as partner_id, partner_name
from partners
where status = 'active'
